summary.span: Represents the collection view for collections that implement .

span.span: Represents the collection view for collections that implement .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你将绑定到数据收集时，你可能想要进行排序和筛选，或者对数据进行分组。When you bind to a data collection, you may want to sort, filter, or group the data. 若要做到这一点，你可以使用集合视图。To do that, you use collection views. 你可以将作为绑定源集合，可用于导航和显示基于排序、 筛选和分组查询的源集合层，而无需操作基础所有源集合本身。You can think of a as the layer on top of the binding source collection that allows you to navigate and display the source collection based on sort, filter, and group queries, all without having to manipulate the underlying source collection itself. 如果源集合实现接口，引发的更改事件传播到视图的视图。If the source collection implements the interface, the changes raised by the event are propagated to the views. 所有集合都有默认。All collections have a default . 实现的所有集合、对象是默认视图对象。For all collections implementing , the object is the default view object. 是用于实现的集合的集合视图类。The is the collection view class used for collections that implement . 若要获取的默认视图，你可以使用方法。To get the default view, you use the method. 有关示例，请参阅[如何： 获取数据收集的默认视图](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-get-the-default-view-of-a-data-collection.md)。For an example, see [How to: Get the Default View of a Data Collection](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-get-the-default-view-of-a-data-collection.md). 有关集合视图的详细信息，请参阅[数据绑定概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For more information about collection views, see [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md).

summary.span: Starts an add transaction and returns the pending new item.

span.span: Starts an add transaction and returns the pending new item.
The pending new item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用启动添加事务。Calling starts an add transaction. 应调用或来结束添加事务。You should call or to end the add transaction. 始终在集合视图中将出现一个新项。A new item always appears in the collection view. 任何筛选、 排序或分组操作也将应用于该视图应用到新项时调用。Any filtering, sorting, or grouping that is applied to the view is applied to the new item when is called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以创建集合的新项，如果没有发生编辑事务，如果该集合不为固定的大小，并且可以创建正确类型的对象。The can create a new item for the collection if there is no edit transaction occurring, if the collection is not a fixed size, and if the can create an object of the correct type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性是`true`，你可以指定通过调用添加到集合的对象方法。If the property is `true`, you can specify an object to add to the collection by calling the method. 是`false`如果不能向集合添加项。 is `false` if items cannot be added to the collection.

summary.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the collection view can discard pending changes and restore the original values of an edited object.

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the collection view can discard pending changes and restore the original values of an edited object.

span.span: if the collection view can discard pending changes and restore the original values of an edited object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是`true`如果编辑的项实现接口。 is `true` if the edited item implements the interface. 如果是`false`，调用以使视图退出编辑状态，并提供逻辑，以还原在编辑过的对象上的更改。If is `false`, call to cause the view to exit the edit state and provide logic to revert the changes on the object that was edited.

summary.span: Ends the edit transaction, and if possible, restores the original value to the item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置到`null`，并使集合视图退出编辑状态。 sets to `null` and causes the collection view to exit the edit state. 如果是`true`，还将还原所编辑对象的原始值。If is `true`, also restores the original values of the edited object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不会不进行任何假设项是否属于基础集合。This method does not make any assumptions about whether the item belongs to the underlying collection. 如果你知道该项属于基础集合，它会更加高效调用。If you know that the item belongs to the underlying collection, it is more efficient to call .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Count As Integer
public: virtual property int Count { int get(); };

summary.span: Gets the estimated number of records.

span.span: Gets the estimated number of records.

value.span:
以下项之一： 值含义
-1 无法确定集合的计数。这可能是由"虚拟化"视图返回，其中视图特意不考虑基础集合中的所有项，因为该视图会尝试以提高效率，最大程度减少对整个集合可用始终都依赖项。
任何其他整数集合的计数。

span.span:
One of the following: Value Meaning
-1 Could not determine the count of the collection. This might be returned by a "virtualizing" view, where the view deliberately does not account for all items in the underlying collection because the view is trying to increase efficiency and minimize dependence on always having the whole collection available.
any other integer The count of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，此计数表示已筛选的计数。Note that this count represents the filtered count.

summary.span: Returns an object that you can use to enumerate the items in the view.

returns.span: An object that you can use to enumerate the items in the view.

span.span: An object that you can use to enumerate the items in the view.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举器实例通常用于使的内容的一个集合，或在此情况下，视图的内容的异步检查。Enumerator instances are typically used for making asynchronous checks of the contents of a collection, or in this case, the contents of the view. 例如，如果您正准备启动`foreach`视图的内容通过迭代，它可能更好的做法获取异步复制以确保，视图项的长度不意外循环期间发生更改。For example, if you are about to start a `foreach` iteration over the contents of the view, it may be better to obtain an asynchronous copy to ensure that the length of the view items does not change unexpectedly midway through the loop.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 此属性只能设置的访问的集合对象，并使用它的各种方法，如`Add`。This property can only be set by accessing the collection object and using its various methods such as `Add`. 要访问集合对象本身的属性是只读的;集合本身是可读/写。The property to access the collection object itself is read-only; the collection itself is read/write. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性：The following example shows how to use this property: [!code-csharp[DataBindingLab#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataBindingLab/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#6)] [!code-vb[DataBindingLab#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataBindingLab/VisualBasic/MainWindow.xaml.vb#6)] 有关完整示例，请参阅[数据绑定演示](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703)。For the complete example, see [Data Binding Demo](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703).

span.span: if the list of items is already in the correct order for grouping; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性设置为`true`会通知视图的项的列表，已在进行分组的正确顺序，并允许视图以使用更有效的算法来生成组。Setting this property to `true` informs the view that the list of items is already in the correct order for grouping and allows the view to use a more efficient algorithm to build the groups. 该数据会在正确的顺序如果：The data is in the correct order if: 1. 属于给定组的所有项都显示连续，和All items belonging to a given group appear consecutively, and 2. 如果集合为非空中的组显示之前的任何其他组，和中的相同顺序。If the collection is non-empty, the groups in appear before any other groups, and in the same order as in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `index` 是集合视图，而不是集合相对路径。`index` is relative to the collection view, not the collection. 例如，如果集合具有 10 项，并且视图具有以便 7 项将出现，有效的值的`index`为 0 到 6。For example, if the collection has 10 items and the view has a so that 7 items appear, the valid values of `index` are 0 through 6.
